body.name: Dash Cam Hardwire Kit 12-24V to 5V / 3A, Micro USB & Mini USB Hard Wire Kit Fuse for Dashcam, Dash Camera Charger Power Cord, （ 13ft)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 1 hr 19 mins
features: ★【Wide Compatibility】This hardwire kit is suitable for most car models(Voltage between 12-24V). Our hardwire kit Equipped Mini USB and Micro USB ports,works for almost all car mini USB & Micro USB ports device, such as dash cam、mirror cam、GPS navigator and radar detector etc(Not fits for Garmin device)

★【24 Hours Surveillance 】 The vehicle hard-wire kit connected to car battery or fuse box power, can uninterruptedly supply power for dash camera for 24 hours. It can even supply power when the car is turned off.If the voltage of your car battery drops to 11.6V or 23.2V, the regulator will cut off the power,which leaves you with enough power to start your car;

★【High Secure Standards】Input: 12v - 24v, Output: 5v 3A /Build in Dynamic IC Charge IC & Magnetic ferrite to prevent Electro-Magnetic shock,Low Voltage and Overcharge Protection, Overall 13ft hardwire kit can be installed basically on All vehicles. Input length: 3ft, Output length: 10ft.
★ 【 Package Contents 】Dashboard Camera Hardwire Kit ( mini USB & Micro USB ports) ,Fuse Tap Cable x4 , Installing crowbar x1 ,User Manual,
★ 【WARRANTY】45-Day Money Back Guarantee and 24-Month Product Replacement Warranty ， Strict production management mode and high quality material let us to make the warranty

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Product descriptionThis dash cam hardwire kit suitable for 12V/24V vehicles, such as car, truck, bus, suvs, or big rig.Can be used for all the 1 or 2 amps input Micro USB & Mini USB car devices, such as Dash Cams, GPS Navigator, Radar and Mirror Cam. Specifications: Connector: Mini USB / Micro USBInput: DC 12-24VOutput: DC 5V / 2A Working Temperature:-40-80℃ Cable Length: 13ft (4M) Low Voltage Protection: When voltage lower than 11.6 V or 23.5 V, automatically cut off the power Package Contents: Dashboard Camera Hardwire Kit ( mini USB & Micro USB ports)Fuse Tap Cable x4 Installing crowbar x1 User Manual

Easy installation Hidden wiring original car appearance beautiful and neatNo need for cable from car cigarette lighter socket, replace it with a permanent hidden cableInstallation in minutes with little to no expertise required.The micro USB hardwire kit with built-in precise switching power supply module can transform 12V(24V) to 5V. The built-in safeguards protect your devices against overheating. 24/7 Parking Surveillance your property is under surveillance no worry about collisions ,theft and scratch anymore Low Voltage Protection This hardwire kit accepts voltage from any type of vehicles runs on 12 – 24V, works perfect for car, truck, bus, suvs, or big rig for continuous power.Smart low voltage protection automatically shut off the power to your dash cam when the battery voltage drops to 11.6V(12V cars) or 23.2V(24V cars), thus preventing it draining the battery.

Installation Instruction Find the Correct Fuse Slot Open the fuse box, find the correct fuse slot for your hardwire kit. If you need to find an ignition switched fuse, put the key in the vehicle, find the fuse which is not lit up while the car is off, and test it by turning the car on to see if it lights up. If your kit requires constant power, turn off the car and remove the key to see which fuse slots stays lit on. Connect the Red Wire Once you've determined which fuse slots you need to use for your hardwiring kit you can crimp the red wire of your hardwire kit onto the Add-A-Fuse. Gently remove the fuse you identified. Install the fuse you just removed into the installation kit add-a-fuse circuit. Plug the add-a-circuit into the fuse box in the correct orientation. Ground the Hardwiring Kit Slip the black wire (which is in the shape of a C) under a metal bolt or screw in your vehicle (this is the ground wire). Check that it is not attached onto plastic parts. You will typically need a socket wrench to loosen the nut or bolt that you choose to ground with. To attach the grounding terminal, loosen the nut or bolt enough to slip it in and tighten it back up afterwards.
Product packing details Dashboard Camera Hardwire Kit Fuse Tap Cable x4 micro usb port User Manual and Installing crowbar

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super easy to install
reviews.reviewText: Wish I had this 10 years ago when I installed my first dashcam. Back then, I had to splice wires and because the fuse kits only contained the short fuse portion, not the whole wire specific for use with webcam. This kit made the job really, really easy. No splicing involved, just plug into the car's cigarette lighter fuse socket and you're done.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy set up for hard wiring.
reviews.reviewText: This set gives you all you need to hard wire a dashcam. The instructions could probably be better but understandable. Installed in a 2012 Kia Sorento which is hard to hard wire because of the sensitive electrics prevalent in all Korean made vehicles. This does it without a problem. The dashcam goes off and on with the ignition just as the wife wants it. Just take your time installing and it will work great for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Loved how easy it was to wire everything up. I’ve used fuse taps before and having to solder up under the dash while everything is wired in place is difficult. The connections made it very easy. I love that it came with different size fuse taps depending on where you want to use it. I also like that it had a mini and micro usb option. Just wish it had a usb type c but I bought an adapter that took care of that. Plenty of length in the wiring. All in all good product. I will be buying another once I get a dash cam for my other car.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Worked great for a while, eventually the power cord became loose (even without me unplugging it or moving it around) stopped working.Edit:customer service was on par with sending out a free replacement, would recommend seller to anyone needing a kit like this

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clear instructions. Easy to install

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: No draining issues with the battery or anything. Hardest part for me was picking which fuse I wanted to tap into lol. I ended up using the ignition fuse so as soon as the key was in the on position it starts the front and rear cam up no problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Order the three wire kits instead.
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these for my AZDOME-M550 dash cams and while they do work I wish I would have ordered the three wire kits so that I could take advantage of the parking camera recording ability. Because these only have two wires they are only powered up while the vehicle is on. While they do work like I thought they would It would have been nice to have the extra capability with the three wire kit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install.
reviews.reviewText: Kit comes with everything you need. Easy to install.
Installation is about 15-20 minutes and easy to connect to the electrical panel. Camera work without any problems.
Todo bien excepto que el portafusible esta muy grande y ya no le queda la tapa del los fusibles.
Awesome product to prevent taking up the 120v ports in my dash. No need to choose between the camera and my phone charger. Thanks
was very easy to install on my Toguard dash cam. bought this set up because it has an inline fuse. so far so good

Note that this is a 2 wire kit- on/off only.Cables were plenty long enough to get through the firewall and to the engine fuse compartment.Multiple fuse holders means you find one that matches your sockets
